text: 2.29-30 1 Ko 16.16-18, Plp 4.10, 1 Ti 5.17 Nɨbi yɨp gɨñɨnɨg gos nɨgɨlɨg yelɨgɨpɨm ak nɨm, nop agyokem yɨp owak. Apɨl wog gɨl, Klays wog ne ak gɨl kumnɨg gak. Ñɨn anɨb ak yad ke mɨdtep gɨnɨm agɨl gos ma nɨgak. Yɨp gɨñɨnɨg owak wog anɨb ak nep gos nɨgak. Mɨñak awl gak ak pen, mɨñak gos ak ma nɨŋɨd pel wog kɨles gɨl gak. Anɨb ak tek ne amjakek, mam chɨn Bɨawl yɨl ayɨp mɨdobun agɨl, nop mɨñmɨñ gɨlɨg ag dɨdeg lɨnɨmɨb. Ne ayɨp, bɨ kɨli ne wog gɨtep gup tek gɨpal okok ayɨp, kɨlop yɨb awl lɨnɨmɨb.
